nodes.text: The Clone Wars: The Battle for Ryloth

The Battle for Ryloth is a young-reader story based on "Storm Over Ryloth", "Innocents of Ryloth", and "Liberty on Ryloth," episodes from the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series. Published by Grosset & Dunlap in 2009, it was adapted by Zachary Rau.

The planet of Ryloth has fallen under siege by Separatist forces. Now Mace Windu must lead the clone army against the evil Separatist Alliance. Only the power of the Force can liberate the people of Ryloth from the brutal droid occupation.
